casebody.data:
BEARBONES, INC.,1 & another2
v.
Charles J. GIAN.3 18-P-1224 Appeals Court of Massachusetts. Entered: May 23, 2019.

So much of the judgment as dismisses the claims against the trustee with prejudice is vacated, and a new judgment shall enter dismissing the claims against the trustee, not on the merits but because the claims have become moot. In all other respects the judgment is affirmed.
